mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectDspBstGodEvlTmpr Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ GOD_NO , STT_RANK , GOD_EVL_COUNT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM DSP_BST_GOD_EVL_TMPR WHERE 1 = 1 AND GOD_NO = #{godNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteDspBstGodEvlTmpr Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM DSP_BST_GOD_EVL_TMPR WHERE 1 = 1 AND GOD_NO = #{godNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
